author: {'steamid': '76561198966421310', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 98717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63667, 'last_played': 1710389560}
review: Big Bang Empire is a humorous adult themed game that has solo and PVP missions to complete for various levels of awards. Each mission has varying times of completion! Various neighborhoods are where missions are found. You are the head of an adult film production studio and your character is the STAR of your studio. Your Star advances by gaining varying basic skills to compete in "fights" against other stars for fame. Some of the items worn by your star boost basic skills. Overall, it's an interesting almost idle game that I've always returned to over the years!

author: {'steamid': '76561199015073645', 'num_games_owned': 58, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1708613778}
review: am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.

author: {'steamid': '76561198416760533', 'num_games_owned': 487, 'num_reviews': 433, 'playtime_forever': 1649, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1305, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1712351902}
review:
Review:
Hey there, fellow gamers! Buckle up and prepare for an adventure like no other! Big Bang Empire has absolutely blown my mind with its unique blend of RPG, strategy, and... ahem seductive elements. ğŸ˜


Let me tell you, this game is not for the faint of heart. From the moment you step into its vibrant and daring world, you'll be greeted by a cast of characters that are as entertaining as they are alluring. The developers have really nailed the art of creating captivating personalities that draw you deeper into the story. It's like being part of a sizzling reality show!


The customization options in Big Bang Empire are simply mind-boggling. Want to create a sexy and confident character? Go ahead! The game gives you the freedom to design your very own superstar, and believe me, the possibilities are endless. ğŸ’ƒğŸ•º


Now, let's talk about the gameplay. It's addictively fun! As you progress through the game, you'll find yourself managing your superstar's career, battling fierce opponents, and even engaging in some steamy interactions. The strategic elements keep you on your toes, and the progression system is satisfyingly rewarding. ğŸŒŸ


However, I must mention that the game's energy system can be a bit restrictive. Sometimes, you'll find yourself itching to dive deeper into the action, only to be halted by the need for more energy. But fear not! The game offers various ways to replenish it, so a little patience goes a long way. ğŸ˜‡


Overall, Big Bang Empire is a wild and alluring ride that offers a refreshing twist to the RPG genre. It's not just about the provocative elements; it's about the gripping storyline, the engaging characters, and the thrill of building your own superstar empire. So, if you're ready to embrace your sexy side and embark on an unforgettable adventure, this game is definitely worth a try! ğŸ”¥ğŸ’«


ğŸ‘ Pros:



Captivating characters and storyline

Extensive customization options

Addictively fun gameplay


ğŸ‘ Cons:



Energy system can feel restrictive at times


So, what are you waiting for? Step into the world of Big Bang Empire and let the seductive journey begin! ğŸ˜‰âœ¨

author: {'steamid': '76561198415376930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 428979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 4840, 'playtime_at_review': 382884, 'last_played': 1712486065}
review:
Hey, Playata...this game is nice and all, but did you forget it exists? I see no updates of any kind being made for this game. Will you fuse servers for this game like you do for Shakes & Fidget? I am asking because i am playing on GR4 server and the server is literally dead. I know that i can play on a more alive server, but i started and put a lot of work on this server, i don't want to change servers and lose all the progress.

And one more thing. Can you please bring back 2 of your old games called SoccerStar and Bloodmoon?
SoccerStar had to do with European football,but it actually worked similarly to Shakes & Fidget.
Bloodmoon had to do with Vampires and Werewolves and archers (archers were supposed to be a reference to Vanhallen if i am not mistaken), but it was similar to Shakes & Fidget.

Let's see if i will get any kind of an answer, although i suppose not,because this game Big Bang Empire is completely and utterly dead. It's a miracle that servers are still up...i imagine the servers are full of dust and spiders. Hey guys, how many years do you have to go down there in the basement to check up/on these servers?

author: {'steamid': '76561198031641554', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1687466447}
review:
SURGICAL EXPERIMENTS ON SLAVES

The father of modern gynecology, J. Marion Sims, gained much of his fame by doing experimental surgeries (sometimes several per person) on slave women, according to The Atlantic. Sims remains a controversial figure to this day, because the condition he was treating in the women, vesico-vaginal fistula, caused terrible suffering. Women with fistulas, a tear between the vagina and bladder, were incontinent and were often rejected by society.

Sims performed the surgeries without anesthesia, in part because anesthesia had only recently been discovered, and in part because Sims believed the operations were "not painful enough to justify the trouble," as he said in alecture according to NPR.

Arguments still rage as to whether Sims' patients would have consented to the surgeries had they been entirely free to choose. Nonetheless, wrote University of Alabama social work professor Durrenda Ojanuga in the Journal of Medical Ethics in 1993, Sims "manipulated the social institution of slavery to perform human experimentations, which by any standard is unacceptable." In 2018, a statue of Sims was removed in response to the ongoing controversy, according to The Guardian.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006784111', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 211, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1505953298}
review:
Big Bang Empire is an online browser game that allows players to create and manage their own adult film studio. The game features a cast of characters that players can interact with, as well as a wide range of customization options for both their characters and their studios.

The gameplay primarily involves completing quests and missions, which often involve creating and filming adult films. The game also features a number of mini-games and activities that players can participate in to earn rewards and advance their careers.

As an online game, Big Bang Empire also features social elements such as chat rooms and forums where players can interact with one another. The game is free to play, but does offer in-game purchases for premium items and currency.

While the game's adult themes may not be suitable for all players, it does offer a unique and somewhat humorous take on the management sim genre. The game's graphics and animations are cartoonish and exaggerated, adding to the game's comedic tone.

Overall, Big Bang Empire is a decent game for those interested in adult-themed management sims. However, its reliance on adult themes may turn off some players, and the game's repetitive gameplay may not hold the attention of more serious gamers for long.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988541754', 'num_games_owned': 792, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 6325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6201, 'last_played': 1682629413}
review:
For english translation scroll down!
Man was hÃ¤tte das Spiel fÃ¼r Potenzial haben kÃ¶nnen, im Stile der alten Lula und Leisure Suit Larry Reihe als Online RPG-Spiel. Der Witz ist ja ansatzweise da, aber was will der Spieler auch von einem Handy-Port erwarten. Die Grafiken erinnern, wirklich an die Zeichnungen von den Erotikspielen der 90er Spiele, was ein gewissen Charme hat. Der Spieler schlieÃŸt angebliche Aufgaben ab, worauf hin ein Zeitbalken eingeblendet wird und hinterer schnÃ¶de Animationen bzw. Standbilder kommen, es gaukelt eine Art Rollenspiel vor, wo man erotische Kleidung und Accessoires ausrÃ¼sten kann, die einem noch fÃ¤higer im Duell machen sollen. Leider wiederholt sich alles bis zum Erbrechen, was schnell in Langeweile ausartet, und ohne Geld kannst du vergessen an die Spitze der Rangliste zu kommen, weil man dafÃ¼r ein voll ausgestattetes Studio haben muss oder aber die lange Zeit zu Ã¼berbrÃ¼cken, was Echtgeld, also umgetauschte Diamanten kostet. Motivation ist in dem Spiel nicht vorhanden, wenn ich Standbilder sehen will, spiele ich lieber Point & Click Adventures, die haben wenigsten eine spannendere Geschichte. Auch dass man wÃ¤hrend der Mission, wenn man diese zusieht, nicht chatten kann, ist ja wohl der grÃ¶ÃŸte Witz, um wenigstens die Zeit zu Ã¼berbrÃ¼cken. Naja, wie sagte einmal ein GeschÃ¤ftsmann auf einer Gamingkonferenz? "Let's go whaling", das trifft eher zu als "Let's talk about Sex" von Salt â€™nâ€™ Pepa, also fast alles was so ein schÃ¶nes Pay2Win Spiel so auf sich hÃ¤lt, um den schmutzigen Ruf in der Gamingbranche zu verteidigen. Dass das Spiel geschnitten ist und eine ungeschnittene Version, leider nur in Englisch von Nutaku gab, brauch ich nicht extra erwÃ¤hnen, weil Steam da restriktiver geworden ist, gerade was den deutschen Markt anbetrifft. Auch das das Spiel in verschieden Browsern und bei Steam ab und zu abstÃ¼rzt, erkennt man bei dem Publisher und Entwickler deren PrioritÃ¤ten, die sagen sich wie Marylin Monroe "Diamonds are girls best friend". Lasst eure Schmuddelfinger von dem Spiel und spielt lieber die alten Larry oder Lula Teile, die allemal besser sind als wie diese schlaffe Nudel oder geht zu Frau Doktor, ins Wartezimmer, da habt ihr mehr Cosplay und Rollenspiel als wie bei dieser Zeitverschwendung und ihr kÃ¶nnt euch sogar nackig machen und in echt chatten. Leider bist du hier der dressierte Affe, mein Freund, wo sich die Gamingbranche scheinbar alles erlauben kann, wie weit man gehen kann, aber Diablo Immortal zeigt ja bereits, dass man keine moralischen Grenzen mehr kennt und die Spieler sehr leidensfÃ¤hig, in Bezug auf Gaming, wie bei einem Domina-Besuch sind. Man hÃ¤lts vor Schmerzen kaum aus, aber man ist so sÃ¼chtig, dass man es immer wieder macht. In diesem Sinne frohes Abzocken. Mal sehen, wann mich die Langeweile wieder packt und ich das Spiel wieder hervorkrame, weil ich dann wieder der perversen SÃ¼nde aus der HÃ¶lle verfallen bin, dann mÃ¶ge mir Anita Sarkeesian mit der Peitsche den Teufel austreiben.

What potential the game could have had, in the style of the old Lula and Leisure Suit Larry series, as an online RPG game. The joke is there to some extent, but what does the player expect from a mobile phone port. The graphics are really reminiscent of the drawings from the 90's adult games, which has a certain charm. The player completes alleged tasks, whereupon a time bar is displayed and behind it there are boring animations or still images, it pretends a kind of role-playing game where you can equip erotic clothing and accessories that are supposed to make you even more capable in a duel. Unfortunately, everything is repeated ad nauseam, which quickly turns into boredom, and without money you can forget about getting to the top of the rankings, because for this you need to have a fully equipped studio or to bridge a long time, which is real money, that is, exchanged diamonds costs. There is no motivation in the game, if I want to see still images, I prefer to play point & click adventures, at least they have a more exciting story. Also the fact that you can't chat during the mission when you're watching it is probably the biggest joke, at least to bridge the time. Well, as a businessman once said at a gaming conference? "Let's go whaling", that's more true than "Let's talk about Sex" by Salt 'n' Pepa, i.e. almost everything that such a nice Pay2Win game is worth to defend the dirty reputation in the gaming industry. I don't need to mention that the game has been cut and that there was an uncut version, unfortunately only in English by Nutaku, because Steam has become more restrictive, especially with regard to the German market. The fact that the game crashes in different browsers and on Steam from time to time shows the publisher and developer's priorities, like Marylin Monroe they say "Diamonds are girls' best friend". Leave your dirty fingers off the game and rather play the old Larry or Lula parts, which are always better than that saggy noodle, or go to the doctor's in the waiting room, there you have more cosplay and roleplay than with this waste of time and you can even get naked and chat in real. Unfortunately, you're the trained monkey here, my friend, where the gaming industry seems to be free to go as far as you can, but Diablo Immortal is already showing that there are no more moral boundaries and the players are very capable of suffering when it comes to gaming , as in a dominatrix visit. You can barely stand the pain, but you're so addicted you do it over and over again. In this sense, happy rip-off. Let's see when I get bored again and dig out the game again because I'll fall back into that perverse sin from hell, then may Anita Sarkeesian whip the devil out of me.

review:
Das Spiel macht SpaÃŸ, ist aber auch super geeignet um es im Hintergrund laufen zu lassen. Ich spiele meist nebenbei Sims 3 und schaue Youtube. Hab es aber auch teilweise bei Home Office arbeiten nebenbei noch laufen. Meine Mitspieler sind super freundlich und ich habe mir mittlerweile ein tolles Studio erstellt. 
Es ist kein "Pay to Win" Spiel, aber es ist durchaus mÃ¶glich Echtgeld im Spiel einzusetzen.

author: {'steamid': '76561199070027704', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 53378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2345, 'last_played': 1699501498}
review:
Who doesn't want to make their own porn-star?! Probably the most fun I've had in months. Its more of a side game than anything I play it aside 'All" my other lewd games. its sort of like one of those really interactive Facebook games' they even have their own chat to meet players in-game, a marriage system, studio's for your friends and such to go to war with other Studio's, the missions are small time arrogance of spending energy and waiting; thus why i say its more so a Facebook game, but all in the same its one of my favorites. Trust me when i say, you'll find plenty of action in Big Bang Empire. only nudity I've seen so far is only what is behind some gem paywalls that you can easily work around with the gem's they have given you, and can earn plenty in-game. The biggest thing I enjoy most about this game is how well tied together everything is to keep you revolving in a cycle to maintain a consistent worth of time spent on playing it, Looking forward to the Long and foreseeable future of this game! I've met great and funny friends, this is a place where you can be your raunchy self! Animations need work though...hope to see you all In-Game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198003102974', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 125159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64622, 'last_played': 1699675441}
review:
It's one of those "idle" games, where you click on something and then wait a certain amount of time for the points. It's more playable than many of those though, because there are a lot of features to keep a person busy, and you can always pick a new mission instead of running out of "energy" like most games have. So, there's never a point when you can't do anything and just have to turn it off. For that, it's been a good game to leave on in the background and click on every now and again. For people who like idle games, collecting, trying to level up over time, and studio battles, I'd recommend.

It's assumed that anyone who says they are getting horny off this game is joking.  It's cartoony and goofball. Definitely not a good game for people who are seeking porn or j.o. material!

I have been in the game since October 2, 2017, Played 1,981 hours. It is sad that the Russian servers are being shut down. I will miss the game.
"Dear Players,
This is your last server shutdown notification. Tomorrow, 12/07/2021, all Russian Big Bang Empire servers will stop working and will be permanently closed.
As explained earlier, we are deeply saddened by the closure of our servers, but the reasons for the closure are beyond our control.
We want to thank you for playing our game with us. We hope Tellville means as much to you as it does to us. "

review:
Assim como Hero Zero, esse Ã© um jogo 8 ou 80, ou seja, tu pode amar ele ou odiar, dificilmente vai ficar no meio termo. 
Esse jogo Ã© um daqueles jogos de facebook que todo mundo jogava hÃ¡ 10 anos atrÃ¡s pra passar o tempo, ele cumpre muito bem a proposta, vocÃª pode fazer muitos amigos e a evoluÃ§Ã£o do seu personagem acaba se tornando algo viciante.

Pra quem jÃ¡ estava acostumado com o Hero Zero, nÃ£o vai ter muitas surpresas nesse jogo, as builds fortes continuam as mesmas, atÃ© mesmo os challenges sÃ£o muito parecidos.
A primeira vez que joguei esse jogo foi no seu lanÃ§amento em 2014 e estou feliz por ele e o Hero Zero terem sido lanÃ§ados aqui na steam em 2016, esses dois jogos marcaram minha vida.

Pontos positivos: 
1 - missÃµes engraÃ§adas.
2 - interaÃ§Ã£o social opcional.
3 - o tempo vai passar sem vocÃª notar.
4 - progressÃ£o viciante, depois de algumas horas tu nÃ£o vai querer parar de jogar.

Pontos negativos:
1 - pay to win, quem paga tem muitas vantagens.
2 - servidor antigo, no momento jÃ¡ existe player no nÃ­vel 995 que estÃ¡ jogando desde 2014, entÃ£o se tu pretende ser o top 1 do ranking geral e vai comeÃ§ar agora, creio que seja impossÃ­vel.

review: This game is for those who have nothing better to do than watch the clock and wait. The idea of the game is that you are an up-and-coming adult film star, and you need to complete missions to earn money. However, unlike an idle game that plays itself while you are away, you start the mission, and you sit and wait until the time runs out, which is anywhere between 1-10 minutes. Steam has twice deactivated my account due to inactivity. This is frustrating, as my previous avatar/account had been over a level of 100, and the deactivation caused me to have to start again from scratch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198307618671', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 1515, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1626162542}
review:
Just another bottom of the barrel shovelware porn game ported from Android.
The game's okay, as far as garbage mobile ports go, at least.

Could definitely use vanity slots for your equipment, though. I can tell right now that I'm totally going to have my character looking like a total clown in a few levels, just for the stat bonuses.

EDIT: yeah, there's a vanity system at level 25.

EDIT2: I've played it some more now, the game is surprisingly solid...ish. Very simple, and clearly designed to mooch money from whales, but it's fine F2P regardless.
My number one complaint about this game is that it's really not that sexy; sure there's bits and bobs and other jiggly bits, but there's no sex, hardly any animations, and the game is just so vanilla that it can get a little boring.

EDIT3: there's definitely a memory leak or something, the game crashes if you leave it open for an hour or two.
The game is still alright overall, but I'm not so sure about all these reforging bonuses people can get, like reflecting damage, hitting twice, bonus evasion chances and such, I've found people with too much money/time can farm for those bonuses and become 10x more powerful. It makes PVP a little iffy, but it's not too bad so far.

EDIT4: Kinda got a bit of a weird opinion about the game now; I played the Nutaku version and it's most certainly quite a lot more lewd, the Steam (and by extension, the Facebook version) are absolutely gutted to the bare minimum, which is absolutely bonkers since Steam allows literal porn now.
THAT SAID, *this* version of the game is still playable, it's just an exceedingly simple "idle" game with a million wait timers. I wouldn't say it's bad, it's just empty.
My opinion: go play this on Nutaku instead.
...and no, you can't port your account to the site, I've double-checked with the devs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048054765', 'num_games_owned': 3029, 'num_reviews': 201, 'playtime_forever': 629, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 627, 'last_played': 1675106740}
review:
Porn star idle RPG. You know how these idle games work, pick a task and then wait X minutes for the timer to reach zero, but with an adult twist. You start as a low budget star and work your way up to a mogul in the industry. However there are a few things that you need to know before you start though.

First off if you intend on playing this game as it was meant to be played in all it's glorious nudity then go play the Nutaku version instead. To no one's surprise the Steam version is the censored version of the game. You're only getting half the experience on Steam.

Since this game was originally a web browser game it still runs in it's original resolution with no way to change it. Playing this on a hi-res monitor shrinks everything to a fraction of the screen.

And lastly but most importantly...

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2420565849

Don't get too attached to your character because they delete inactive accounts.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140307902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 44490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41997, 'last_played': 1644086149}
review:
[h1]IntroducciÃ³n[/h1]

Recomiendo el juego solamente porque lo que vi de positivo es la comunidad que me encontrÃ©, me mantengo en el juego no solo por eso, si no, porque aspiro a ser uno de los mejores en el servidor espaÃ±ol.

[h1]ReseÃ±a[/h1]

â¥Del vamos es el tÃ­pico juego Pay 2 Win, pero no del todo como la gente cree. El juego no te priva de forma gratuita los diamantes en ningÃºn momento y las formas en las que puedes utilizarlos son bastante lucrativas al final, si bien se pueden omitir las misiones pagando tambien puedes usar los diamantes gratuitos en vez de pagar por ellos.

â¥En el apartado de "gameplay" no es la gran cosa, iniciar una misiÃ³n y esperar a que termine, puedes hacer pelÃ­culas XXX que bÃ¡sicamente es esperar a que se llene la energia de pelÃ­cula y hacer las misiones para llenarla al 100%. Los duelos es otra parte importante del juego, ya que subes la fama y consigues alguno que otro billete o prenda para mejorar al personaje.

â¥Una parte fundamental del juego son los estudios(clanes, facciones o como gustes llamarlos) los cuales tienen un templo semanal que se basa en completar ciertas cosas para que tu estudio logre estar primero( y son muy buenos premios inclusive en el tercer o cuarto puesto de la clasificaciÃ³n). El estar en un estudio tambiÃ©n le da ventajas a tu personaje, como bonus de mayor % de billetes conseguidos o experiencia, asÃ­ tambiÃ©n como un bonus de aumento de habilidades, todo esto depende de que tan mejorado estÃ© el estudio.

â¥La comunidad es muy agradable en parte, de momento no me encontrÃ© con muchas personas que sean odiosas o pervertidas, lamentablemente hay una parte que sÃ­ es pervertida y en mi caso, solo lo experimente con una persona, el infame "empotrador". AsÃ­ que es un punto a favor pero a medias, ya que lamentablemente es posible que te encuentres con el lado asqueroso de esta.

â¥En cuanto a personalizaciÃ³n no es muy amplia, vas a poder personalizar la cara pero no mÃ¡s que eso, si bien el juego presenta un sistema de prendas que cada una te da diferentes puntos de habilidad para tu PJ, no vas a poder personalizar a gusto y a su vez aumentar tus habilidad, lamentablemente vas a tener que elegir entre una u otra, puedes solucionarlo pagando diamantes para cambiar el aspecto de una prenda, pero como es de esperar, vas a encontrar otra mejor y tendrÃ¡s que tirar la prenda que cambiaste y junto a ella, tus diamantes.

â¥El apartado visual no es la gran cosa, no posee muy buena calidad pero su estilo es agradable, es un toque caricaturesco con una parte bizarra que no logre a ser erÃ³tico al 100%, de hecho, el juego censura bastante, lo mÃ¡ximo que verÃ¡s son pechos desnudos, fuera de eso, censura pura de una forma cÃ³mica.

â¥Del sonido no hay mucho que decir, es simple sonido ambiente que entra en loop, un loop que es bastante fÃ¡cil de reconocer ya que no se molestan en disimularlo de ninguna manera, tambiÃ©n puedes elegir que cambiar el sonido de tu personaje al dar y recibir golpes, puedes usar el default o el "pornoso" el cual solo son gemidos mÃ¡s relajados.

[h1]OpiniÃ³n[/h1]

En mi opiniÃ³n, lo recomiendo, pero solo como un pasatiempo cuando no tengas que jugar, porque como ya dije, es un juego P2W como cualquier otro, de hecho, es perfectamente comparable con un juego de mÃ³vil que no inmova en absolutamente nada.

[h1]English version[/h1]

[h1]Introduction[/h1]

I recommend the game only because what I saw as positive is the community that I found myself, I stay in the game not only because of that, but because I aspire to be one of the best in the Spanish server.

[h1]Review[/h1]

â¥It is the typical Pay 2 Win game, but not quite as people think. The game does not deprive you of diamonds for free at any time and the ways in which you can use them are quite lucrative in the end, although you can skip the missions by paying you can also use the free diamonds instead of paying for them.

â¥In the "gameplay" section it is not a big deal, start a mission and wait for it to finish, you can make XXX movies which basically is to wait for the movie energy to be filled and do the missions to fill it 100%. Duels are another important part of the game, as you raise fame and get the odd ticket or garment to improve the character.

â¥A fundamental part of the game is the studies (clans, factions or whatever you like to call them) which have a weekly temple that is based on completing certain things so that your study manages to be first (and they are very good prizes even in the third or fourth ranking position). Being in a study also gives your character advantages, such as a bonus of a higher% of tickets obtained or experience, as well as a bonus for increasing skills, all this depends on how improved the study is.

â¥The community is very pleasant in part, at the moment I did not meet many people who are hateful or perverted, unfortunately there is a part that is perverted and in my case, I only experienced it with one person, the infamous "embedder". So it is a point in favor but half, since unfortunately it is possible that you find the disgusting side of this.

â¥As for customization, it is not very broad, you will be able to customize the face but not more than that, although the game presents a system of garments that each one gives you different skill points for your PC, you will not be able to customize taste and in turn increase your skills, unfortunately you will have to choose between one or the other, you can solve it by paying diamonds to change the appearance of a garment, but as expected, you will find a better one and you will have to throw away the garment that you changed and next to her, your diamonds.

â¥The visual section is not a great thing, it does not have very good quality but its style is pleasant, it is a cartoonish touch with a bizarre part that does not manage to be 100% erotic, in fact, the game censors a lot, the most that you will see they are bare breasts, outside of that, pure censorship in a comical way.

â¥There is not much to say about the sound, it is simple ambient sound that goes into a loop, a loop that is quite easy to recognize since they do not bother to hide it in any way, you can also choose to change the sound of your character when giving and get hit, you can use the default or the "pornoso" which are just more relaxed moans.

[h1]Opinion[/h1]

In my opinion, I recommend it, but only as a hobby when you don't have to play, because as I already said, it is a P2W game like any other, in fact, it is perfectly comparable with a mobile game that does not immove anything at all.

Reading through some of the other reviews, it seems this is a re-occurring problem.

Big Bang Empire
Erotic MMO from 2016.

Life is full of adventure - just not in your little town of Tellville. A career in the adult business is obviously the best way to get away from there. Big Bang Empire takes a humorous look at the most beautiful thing in the world - and the business around it. Create your individual star and conquer the erotic Olympus. Improve your skills, collect funky accessories, team up with friends in a studio, make your own films and show everyone else where the hammer is!

This is the advertising text and I can't write more about it.
I tested the game for you for four hours.
This game is probably only for people who want to run it on their office computer in the background and want to have a look now and then. If this game made sense, I couldn't find it. Completely superfluous game that is also boring and a time waster.

Find another one, even free is too expensive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040761939', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1457, 'last_played': 1582987602}
review:
This title is only for those who WAN'T TO PAY A LOT from now 'till eternity to keep advancing. At level 35(ish) you can't advance anymore by fame, and achievable achievements are slowed down to less than once a week. In other words; When your STARTER BOOST expires, there is nothing left 4 u unless you pay. 

Whenever there's a game that uses this strategy, those who play free only serve as cannon fodder for those who pay. Also for casual clicker, there is TONS of futile clicking. Any customization is more expensive than the price of todays top gametitles.

NOT RECOMMENDED. 
...and btw; "Sexual content" is really stretching it here.
-15 out of 5.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017476710', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 115334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115308, 'last_played': 1600710500}
review:
Deeeeeep! Very Deep game.
Sometimes it drifts into the weeds.
Depends on what you want to do.
How you want to make your fortune.
How you want to improve your skills.

Studios, they're a thing. You know for films.
That's where the gravy is, in films. 
What you do with that gravy, 
well that's your business.
I don't want to know about it.

Hilarious game that doesn't take too long to play.
You can do everything without spending a dime.
I recommend it if you like casual games.
Leave it up while you do other things, click a bit.
Have a duel or ten. Whatever works for  you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077267079', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 96978, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37377, 'last_played': 1587003748}
review:
While it says porn star, it is more of a detective game, you have to figure out how to move up in the game. You get to play multiple things at once and do other things while waiting for missions to finish. Missions need energy and there is a limit on the amount of energy you can get in one day. you can make from 3 to 5 movies a day and you can fight other players. I would suggest joining one of the groups, a group can have 30 members, and have fights with other groups. They also can increase your stats from 10% to 100%
A good game for casual playing

author: {'steamid': '76561198093355799', 'num_games_owned': 5830, 'num_reviews': 332, 'playtime_forever': 1922, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1922, 'last_played': 1570996924}
review:
Big Bang Empire is a sexual, free2play idler game where your goal is to create your own porn empire.
By doing missions you'll be able to earn money, diamonds and sexy outfits.
Level up your skills/stats to become stronger and beat other players by fighting them in duels.
You can create your own studio, level it up, unlock bonuses, invite people, enter studio events and fight against other studio's.
The missions are endless and there is more than enough to do!

However, I personally enjoyed it for some time but it gets repetitive and boring fast.
Every mission takes time and can take up to 15 minutes or so.
You can buy diamonds to speed up your progression and also buy outfits etc, but it's not necessary since you'll earn diamonds by playing the game too.

I received items that would give me a bonus boost for a week but it abruptly ended after just 4 days.
Those items cost 99 diamonds each, which is a lot! So yea... that was disappointing.
Upgrading your skills and studio cost a lot too! 
You are able to join studio's, but most are inactive and don't compete in events or duels against other studio's.

It's more of a background game that you can play while doing other things on the PC.
You don't see actual porn, at most, if you're lucky you'll see some nipples lol.
It's a free, simple, sexy and decent time killer that was able to keep me busy for 32 hours!
Therefor, despite being displeased about certain things, I still enjoyed it enough to recommend the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065902081', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 23583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23583, 'last_played': 1502474160}
review:
One of my favorite games. I mostly play the mobile and browser versions recently. You are an aspiring porn star trying to make it in the industry. You go on mission to boost the career. Get in "Duels", Work with a studio and produce films. 

I do wish you could change a lot of it to make your characters roles more fitting. I want my character to be a gay porn star. I change all his covers to male costars but other than that you aren't really allowed to specify it. 

I joined a studio with other queer players when I started the game two years ago and have been with the same group since then. They have made the game fun. i love temple challenges. Except for convention temples. Those suck lol. Love the temple system though. Love working in a studio. Studio fights. THe support etc. If your a friend of mine wanting to join the game. Come join King Cobra XXX. 

 I wish there were male pinups available when they added that feature as well. I only do those challenges for the rewards and even then don't seek them out often because i'm not interested in seeing the female nudity. I wish there was a way to block that honestly. It was unavoidable. I had to click to get my reward then click away as fast as I could.  Wish there was more though into making it for everyone. 

As for cost. Saving your diamonds is a must in this game. I wish I had done it more sooner. I've used diamonds accidentally which was the worst and just not utilized them as well as I could in the beginning. Storage upgrade is a great use if you want to save up for a specific temple challenge like I always do. 

I wish there were more male costars available for cash amounts over diamonds. The three that we get a re kind of just okay. It gets repetitive to use them over and over again on covers like I  usually do to try to make my porn releases gay. The costars hasn't shifted since I've started and I think a lot of people would love to see more added in.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062734664', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1569586601}
review:
I have no idea how this game got "mostly positive" reviews at time of writing. I played it for about three hours, and it crashed six times, resetting progress and time played. Almost zero nudity, heck this doesn't rate "adults only", it's barely beyond PG-13 at best. The game-play is non-existent too. It's no different than those other cookie-cutter freemium games where you push a button, a timer slowly runs down, and you get a bunch of virtual rewards that lets you push a button and wait again.

There needs to be a "super do not recommend" button.

author: {'steamid': '76561198953098408', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 11534, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1366, 'last_played': 1710305974}
review:
The game is fairly basic, and can be a money sink, if you allow it.  Don't trust the stats you have, however, as they are normally a lie.  You might have a 47% crit chance against another player, but expect to never ever crit, same goes for dodge.  
     The game overall is fun and quite interesting.   The level of fun could be greatly improved if they would get rid of the censorship issues in the game.  There are breasts, but most the time they are covered.  Don't expect much else visually, which is sad seeing as you are a porn actress/actor.
     The missions are timed, which means you might sit around for 15 or more minutes waiting for one to complete.  The "shop" seldom has anything for you after level 12, so you'll need it only to change the looks of clothes after level 25 and to sell stuff you get in missions and through rewards.
      If they would get rid of the sensorship, show full nudity and allow for other scenes to show far more, this is a porn game after all, I would rate it higher.  It could easily be a 8 or 9 out of 10  But as it stands, it's at best a 6.5 out of 10.
      Yes, I would recommend the game.  It's fun, but also a game for wasting time with a few rewards for doing so.  The pictures you get as rewards are not worth the time spent getting them, but some of the text, titles and scenes are great.

review:
Wait-or-pay mechanic at its worst. "Time tasks" mean you have to sit and look at a progress bar. Can't even start many such "missions" at once. 
It's like a parody on bad mobile games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104303289', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1613605280}
review:
Ignore the negative SJW bullshit about this game. The game is cute and adorable. Yes, it's a time frame game; but who cares. It's just a free game to add to your library and play when your talking on the phone or bored of your other games. The animations and the artwork is super cute and you can create your own character. 

I like it. You don't have to P2W if you don't want to... Just ignore it. But all in all I love this game. And I love how my character looks. It's a good game; and I'm happy I stumbled upon it. Don't let the haters and the 'Eww! Scantly clad girls!' hater-SJW-Republican feminist 'gamers' scare you away... Just try the game and if you don't like it keep truckin'. So thumbs up form me.

review:
Fun casual game, started off as a Flash browser game. 
However, far too buggy when not played in the browser. For a while the standalone client worked really fine, then some update broke too many things. Stopped playing because of that and because of very poor support.
Go play it in the browser, if you'd like to. On Steam I can not recommend it due to the bugs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050939092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 107534, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105662, 'last_played': 1528015299}
review:
Its a terrible game. You'll get eaten alive by the pay to win players on top of that. The game is littered with click traps that will make you spend the irlmoney currency. It is playable free to play but you'll find it is soul sucking if you want to stay relevant needing to invest 6+ hours of active play time every day to complete everything.

Don't let my playtime fool you. Most of it was idle in the background (Or chatting with teammates on the very broken chat). If you are reading this heed my warning and walk away and do not look back. If you are already playing, cold turkey it and just uninstall, you're doing yourself a favor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053514042', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 1548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1548, 'last_played': 1529720063}
review:
The ONLY reason I am recommending this is because it is "free to play."  There is a "buy stuff for real money to advance faster" shop option, but I cannot in good conscience advise anyone to spend more than a nickel (USD $0.05) on this game.  Bottom line: good for a chuckle or two, but not much fun after the first 2 hours.  NOT FOR KIDS!!!  Install it, play for a couple of hours just to say you tried it... and then you will probably want to uninstall it.

WARNING: This game contains suggestive themes, but no actual pornography.  Many of the mission descriptions you will read in this game are lewd or rude, character models are meant to resemble porn star stereotypes, background art is a cartoon version of cheap porno films, and the equipment you can make your character wear is ... um ... freaky at best and skimpy at worst.  NOT FOR KIDS, I would say if you have kids under 11 don't even install this.  Not recommended for kids under 16, in my opinion.  It isn't really that much fun anyway, it is basically a long-running gag about the porn industry.  Good for a laugh for about 15 minutes, maybe an hour... then it gets repetitive and a little boring.  It is a "flash" game, and it is a "clicker" style.  

There are several types of missions you can do as quests (single player), each quest costs a small amount of energy which replenishes every day or you can instantly refresh by spending diamonds (buy more diamonds for real money, or win them from achievements in-game).  Some you need to meet a certain stat requirement (strength, charisma, etc) to complete successfully - they will tell you which stat but not how high it needs to be.  Some are just timed, meaning you wait a few minutes and it completes automatically.  And some are fights - you face off against some enemy in whatever the default background is for that mission.  Those fights, you take turns attacking and you just sort of "blink" when you attack and that's all.  Cheap flash video action.  Completing these quests will get you XP to levelup (raise stats) as well as some in-game cash and occasionally a new piece of equipment or an event item.  There is a shop where you can buy or sell equipment.  There is a film being produced in each city, too, with quests similar to the regular ones but instead of your overall energy they use a resource that is specific to the film studio.  Completing the quests there will let you spend diamonds to upgrade the title and background image on your movie poster. Finishing the movie will let you move to the next city.  Then there is a little multiplayer action where you duel against other players.  This is exactly like the fight quests, it is entirely based on who has the highest stats, and a little bit of luck with dodging and critical hits.  Online duels will earn you glory points so you can rise in the leaderboards.

review: The game is casual, light RPG experience, and it does that pretty well. Theme is ridiculous, but it's intentional, so you're supposed to be making fun of things and not taking this serously. If you're going for some light-hearted fun you're going to be happy and enjoy it; you just need to know what you're getting and not have other expectations.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058041706', 'num_games_owned': 667, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 728830, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239783, 'last_played': 1704145645}
review:
This is a great game to play hella casual.

At the time of this review, my star is nearly level 200~

Contrary to popular belief, this isn't a pay to win style of game, and the microtransactions to buy diamonds are completely optional. It gives you plenty of diamond rewards for just playing the game, so unless you're just really lazy or have way too much cash to spare, buying diamonds doesn't get you much more than the average player, save for a few extra refreshes, extra refinements, extra speed ups and some cosmetics.
There's plenty of fully expanded Studios to join, as they are usually always looking for new players, so you don't even need diamonds to pay for a Studio.

I see a lot of people complaining it's not what they expected. 
Play this game on Nutaku if you want it to be more... graphic; this is the very censored version released for Steam.
As for the people complaining about how Steam has 'fallen low' for hosting this, just remember that there are lot more trashy sex-themed games as well as badly developed indie games that aren't nearly as well done as this game.

Not to mention, the forum is full of moderators that are in contact with the developers, so they're always working to improve and add different things to the game and keep the player-base happy.

I would love to get the in-game successes available as Steam Achievements though, it would definitely feel a lot more worth it to play for Achievement Hunters like myself~
Also, it would be cool if the item sets from Wandas Secret Shop were counted as DLC; if you create a new Star, they won't have the set and you'd have to rebuy it.

Over all, this is game is satirical, and entertaining enough for people not looking for something intense.
It's got fun competition and heaps of little odd bits bobs to do.
So if you're a hardcore casual like me, this game is probably gonna do it for you~

author: {'steamid': '76561198053083938', 'num_games_owned': 417, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 11063, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10969, 'last_played': 1518139101}
review:
This game gets you about half way there, if you know what I mean.... actually, it gets you halfway to enjoyment, but never really delivers. To shorten this review in one blurb: 

Big Bang Empire is a porn themed game that shows no nudity and plays like a 2008 facebook game. It has energy cool downs, pay to win mechanics, an endless grind with no benefit to higher levels or gear, and you can spam your "friends" with requests for energy. Most of your time is spent idling this game while playing something else, only switching back to click a button, then alt-tabbing back to another game.

This is one giant time sink with no value or memorable experiences what-so-ever. 1/10.

edit: spelling

author: {'steamid': '76561198114788467', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 5249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5249, 'last_played': 1518968424}
review:
This is a free porn parody game.
Be the pornstar of your dreams, make pornos, fight pornstars, put some cloths on and make senpai notice you.
The pornstars can look kinda cool, sassy or derpy.
The music isn't something to write home about, the animation is almost none existant, the story and the community isn't something to write home about either.
There are no badges, cards or achievements.
If you like to play a basic porn game with some nipples in it without going onto pornsights then this might be a game for you.
Have fun, enjoy and don't forget the buttplug :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198010274419', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 223, 'playtime_forever': 59302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 850, 'last_played': 1629678634}
review:
[b]Summary[/b]
A free casual idler time-sink pornstar "RPG" game. From what I gather, it's also a browser game that's uncensored. Play a lot like other idler games on facebook and such. Pretty easy in general, but it's also funny at least. Mainly solo play, but a slice of multiplayer with autoplayed duels and joining other studios (guilds).

[b]My Gripes[/b]
[list][*]Lots of minor spelling and grammar errors.
[*]In dire need of achievements since it's on Steam.
[*]Follows a lot of other templates set by other idler time-sink games.
[*]Fullscreen?
[*]Censored.[/list]

[b]Rating[/b]
It's not bad, but it's nothing amazing.

[b]4/10[/b]

review: I huge con is that is is one of those real time FB format RPGs. However, it does have a weird, corny charm to it. It's easy to play missions in the background. There is a decent character customization system, and it allows you to pour in game "money" into your stats so you can have your preferred "armor." It's a fun time waster that you don't have to buy into the whole "pay to win" deal to have fun.

review: its a cute game and has recieve many new features. however it lacks reason to play and completing all of your daily missions it a time drain. this game is also availiable on your phone and facebook which leads us to the next problem. it does not transfer accounts well. if you start the game on steam you can only log in on steam. if you start on the android app you can only logg in on the app. same thing with playing through facebook. You can "unbind account" from steam to log in from your favorite internet browser but after you unbind you will not be able to log in from steam anymore.

review: This game is really fun to play and easy to hide in the background if doing other stuff online. The only thing I don't like is the PvP system, but then I've never really been a fan of PvP in general in games. The background stories behind each mission & events add that little extra detail that makes the game fun & worth playing if the promise of full character customizing didn't already grab you're attention.

review:
Je ne conseille nullement ce jeu a mes relations comme aux autres joueurs. 
Un seul mot pour le dÃ©crire : A BANNIR !!!!! 

Les dÃ©penses de ce jeu deviennent extrÃªme et aucune MAJ est faite hormis pour annoncer de nouveaux vÃªtements (coloris, nouveautÃ©s,â€¦) devenant de plus en plus coÃ»teux a avoir et donc plus rare a obtenir sans dÃ©penses (box, Ã©vÃ©nements, pyramide de la chance,etcâ€¦). Les joueurs les plus lourds vont jusquâ€™Ã  dÃ©pensÃ© + 800â‚¬ par mois, pour garder la meilleur position sur les classements, engagent les joueurs les plus motivÃ©s et n'hÃ©sitant pas a faire du mÃ©nage quand cela deviens nÃ©cessaire ou encore pousse le vice en vous attaquant tous les jours (duel). En dehors des Ã©volutions de personnages et de studio, les Ã©vÃ©nements de type convention (unique), deviens souvent des silences radios en dehors des temples. Niveau social a fuir si vous cherchez la tranquillitÃ© ou le social ! Les joueurs comme les joueuses cherchent et poussent souvent le vice trÃ¨s loin a de harcÃ¨lement ou des Ã©changes se**elles. Nâ€™hÃ©sitant pas a rÃ©clamer leurs positions de libertinages ou encore d'objets.

CÃ´tÃ© support,obligation de passer par le forum,crÃ©ation d'un compte forum avec nom du personnage que vous jouez et crÃ©ation d'un ticket,avec dÃ©claration et screenshot qui sert a rien et qui peut prendre des heures voir des jours selon la demande. (complet ou non) Les admis ou les modos du forum, ne sont clairement pas des pros et attendre une action de leur part est comme demandÃ© a ses petits enfants de venir nous voir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000922770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 98249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48258, 'last_played': 1582929809}
review:
Pretty good game. Don't believe that it is P2W because it's not. Doing missions and just regular play will get you a lot of diamonds. You can pay for diamonds but they aren't really worth it and it's pretty expensive. Join a studio that is already maxed out stats if you want the best experience. Play regularly and you will do fine. It's not terrible but it's a time waster.

If you want easy entertainment with not a lot of difficulty: this is it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198214358240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2555, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 740, 'last_played': 1556347202}
{'steamid': '76561198161070934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1906, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1246, 'last_played': 1499891809}
review:
People who don't like casual Apps (apps, not actual games) like this are the type of people that don't actually understand how fun it is to engage in such menial tasks, which often prove themselves the much needed break from the softcore games which many gamers delve into proclaiming they're hardcore to begin with. It's not meant to be a retardedly difficult auto-confirm combo, button mashing, min-maxing, shitstorm with a playerbase boasting skill where it lacks such skill entirely.

The features in this game clearly state where it's coming and going...
Humorous comic style
Individual character creation
Funny missions
PvP against other stars
GvG against other studios
Sexy outfits and accessoires

It's a casual game, free to play, enjoyable by the laughs alone. Anyone with half a mind can plainly see it's 95% satire and 5% poking fun at everyone that would claim this game sucks.

All in all, I love it; the missions are simple, the "PvP" is straightforward, the level up and stat boosting process are clean. Ideally I'd like to see some form of alternate animation other than full cell movement, different sounds, and perhaps a UI that allows resolution changes to fit your window (often the lower portion of mine is clipped). It has a Pay-to-Win system in place that's pretty obvious, and otherwise does not suggest it isn't that type of game; alone in its transparency I would like to add if you're angry at the App for being pay-to-win, you've lost yourself to ego.

I'm not one for pixel nudity to be honest, so this and Hero Zero are contending for my attention between games.

It's something to do while you're waiting for other stuff, and is a great background game that requires minimal attention, and can satiate that "Completionist" need from time to time. There are much worse games out there than this one...much, much worse.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070916659', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 146623, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33936, 'last_played': 1537488960}
review:
Surprisingly good! Most of the bad reviews are just complaining about the fact that it's a click and wait game. However, if you're like me and you know there are much worse genres out there than click and wait (let's not name them here lest we offend the fanboys...), and if you don't mind the adult theme (and really, the game is barely R rated), give it a try, it's free!
Also, BBE is just the sexy version of Hero Zero (Playata's other click and wait game), so if you want a more in depth review, check out the one I did for that game. Everything in it applies to BBE as well.

review:
Pretty much your typical wait or pay facebook game with a pr0n theme that is more cheesy than racy. Not sure if this type of game should be on steam in the first place, but personally I still like to waste some time in it and level my character in between other games, or when I am bored. 

As long you treat it with the right approach; aka as a mere time waster and refuse to fall for their paywalls, you will be fine in playing it. However, you don't miss out on anything either, if you give this game a pass.

review:
if you like Lula Wet Empire on DOS 1998, this game has that similar vibe but more in-depth with  Point and click Role-playing game, while the game have been subjectively bad on interaction with other players. thankfully the quirky  art style and some interesting characters on this game is kind of funny. 

PROS
+ Games for Adult  
+ Fun Game
+ Easy Reward
+ Funny/Cheesy Game
+ Easy to   Play
+ worldwide Currency supported pretty affordable F2P game
+ addicting if you had  the time to invest to play this game
+ interesting concept 


Cons and suggestion -

- lack interaction with other players
+ Suggestion put Lobby Chat when not playing
-  animation sucks.... 
+ Suggestion  fix that damn boring battle animation, or at least make the characters more dynamic then just  looking at stiff sonic booms lol.
-  DLC needed  to start off  with reasonable stats " Wouldn't mind spending for it to save money"

author: {'steamid': '76561198048974498', 'num_games_owned': 2973, 'num_reviews': 812, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1480944680}
review:
Wow, that's some interesting game design right there. Big Bang Empire makes you wait a certain number of minutes to magically complete a "mission", but you can of course speed this process up by spending real-world money like a complete nincompoop. Think of it as a sub-standard "clicker" game with an inkling more interactivity, and you're pretty close.

   They say that porn and video games are two of the major forces pushing technology forward, but this product proudly catapults both fields all the way back to the stone-age. Your time would honestly be better spent having a quick, tawdry wank whilst your parents are out shopping.

Verdict: 3.5/10.

review: This game is incredibly boring, the sit and wait style is not my cup of tea, and the duel mechanic is minimal. Everything requires energy of some kind, which makes this game more suitable to a facebook environment, than a game you'd want to get on steam.  I can not recommend this game to anyone, however, if my review makes it sound like something for you, the price tag of free shouldn't get in the way of trying it.  It's only 108 MB, so, shouldn't take long to install and try.  There's no actual nudity, or porn, for anyone thinking that there is, crazy stupid exposed outfits, but that's about as close as it gets.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085551904', 'num_games_owned': 1072, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1478966891}
review:
Beh non ci siamo, come ho trovato questo gioco? 
Stavo sfogliando la lista dei suggerimenti, quando mi appare questo gioco, a occhi bendati lo scarico, ero curioso di vedere che gioco avevano fatto.
Entrato (nel gioco), mi trovo la schermata della creazione personaggio, scelgo la femmina poichÃ© non mi va di vedere un uomo a torso nudo e col pacco duro. Fatto il personaggio seguo il semplice tutorial, che mi ha rotto le balls dopo i primi 30 secondi. Finito il tutorial, beh si clicca robe e si compra roba, si arriva al lv 9 per vedere cosa si fa nella modalitÃ  film, uno pensa, ci saranno scene hot, e invece no! Voleviiii?! 
Anche li solo clic e clic e clic e clic, avete capito?
C'Ã¨ anche la modalitÃ  dove si "combatte" contro altri giocatori, ma non si fa nulla, si sentono solo suoni che simulano le botte e il personaggio non fa nessuna animazione, sbatte solo contro il suo avversario. 
Comunque, qualcuno di voi si sta chiedendo, ma in sto gioco si deve shoppaere per forza?
Sni, mi spiego, dopo circa mezz ora di gioco se uno non vuole perdre la vita ad aspettare, deve per forza spendere i diamanti (la valuta a pagamento), se uno non spende deve aspettare minuti o ore prima di andare avanti con la storia o con i film.
Graficamente assomiglia a un gioco per cellulare, non si puÃ² mettere in full screen e si Ã© obbligati a tenerlo in una finestra quadrata.
In conclusione..
Vi consiglio di non scaricarlo, perdete solo tempo, perche non Ã©:
-Divertente
-Non Ã© Hot
-Non da sfida 
-Ãˆ ridicolo

author: {'steamid': '76561198007471259', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 239, 'playtime_forever': 115434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10218, 'last_played': 1499269451}
review: Actually one of the fairer Free to Play games, 8/10! You can fight, do missions and find better clothes for you avatar and do up to 3 films per day. You get rewards for finishing certain amount of missions, and are often rewarded the in game currency Diamonds, which you can also buy with real money. In contrast to other such games, you get quite a lot of these by just playing the game... only for building your own Studio, you need to buy them (in game earned ones dont count, thats the only turn off I found so far). The text is a bit funny, sexy and raunchy... and your (female) Avatar can look quite sexy in the right clothes, but I play this now for 2-3 weeks, and still find it entertaining and I want to get better and better and find better stuff... and that all for free.

review:
Dows anybody remember a game called [b]BIING![/b] from the late 90's?

This is like a facebook-type BIING-Tamagochi with microtransactions:
- You can't really do anything except wait
- ... unless you pay money to wait a little less long
- the only mature content in the game (that i could find) was the word "dildo"

This is just another idler hoping to prove that "(alledged) sex sells"

Las misiones y la forma de jugar no pierden nunca su lÃ³gica, es bastante fiel aunque desenfadado a la realidad de la vida de una chica que estÃ¡ empezando en el mundo del porno.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977587610', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 3711, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3165, 'last_played': 1486488462}
review:
Big Bang Empire is a game that i would catagorise in the facebook category.
Kinda like maffia style dueling, improving your character and clan, but then everything in a porn theme.

- The artwork is not bad but not great in a cartoonish karikature style.
- The options of customising your character are cool, but there is usually no compromise between cosmetic value and usefulness. So as you level up you will have to say goodbye to your sexy nurse outfit.

What it succeeds most in, is rewarding the players who actually put time into the game.  All too often a player is rewarded for how many days he has been playing compared to how intensive he has been playing. But this game's timings seem just about right so you can progress faster compared to somebody who only plays 2 hours a day.

I recommend this game bacuse it doesn't suck. But like most facebookgames (that's why i catagorised it like this), most people will probably grow tired of it within weeks.


Edited:
I went from recommending this game to not recommending it. After the positive things i wrote here, i have to admit that they really screwed this game up. From around level 15 for studio's you cannot progress further unless you pay and buy diamonds. For most of the tasks you would like to do; for example change your profile picture, you get enough free diamonds. However to upgrade your studio further you have to pay 100 diamonds for each level! Not only that but they also made the game buttons very tactical. Sometimes actions require money, sometimes diamonds. However there is no confirmation needed, so that way you are bound to spend your free diamonds, that you worked hard to get, on useless actions by accident.
I see a lot of people stopping to play around this level and i can fully understand why now, as i will do the same.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982295752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2097, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1472392496}
review:
Big Bang Empire is a free to play stat based multi-player RPG web browser / mobile game in a flat 2D world.  It worked on Win 10, played ok, sounded ok, looked ok.   The game is a stupid but sexy tease ,that is censored for Steam age group: Teen up to 18.  It has PVP that looks like you are bumping card board cutouts together.  The animation looks terrible.  Looks like a reskined Hero Zero or Operation X from the same Developer.  The game get repetitive and boring after short period of time.  Everything you do has an increasing timer of real time.  

You probably could save your time by watching youtube gameplay of this game, instead of playing it.  

Try it, but delete it before you pay real money or get bored with it.  

The Nutaku version of this game is 18 plus but still not worth playing compared to all the other games on Nutaku dot net.

For more info:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_KDxDqZmMYo

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QC0mLPSP7mM

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bloAcTiRcEk

Update: turning it into a "real review" since "Facebook game" wasn't clear enough for some people.

"3/10. Facebook game." According to My Own Ratings.

Click. Wait a few minutes. Come back and click again. Annoy your friends until they unfriend you. Annoy random people. Befriend random people and annoy them anyways.
That's it for the basic game mechanics. All you need is a theme on top of it and you have a facebook game. This game's theme was porn. Porn is good. This game should be good. But it's a facebook game, so I can't recommend it. 


Click. Wait. Click again. Annoy people. Eventually spend money.

review: Eeesh... The only positive thing I can say about this game is it has a lot of polish on the cartoonie graphics--the backrounds, props, and characters are all very well drawn. My advice to the developers: Rethink and redo. This game might actually be playable if it was a real point-and-click adventure with cell animation, like Leisure Suit Larry, not some microtransaction clickbait driven by greedy enteprenuers and insipid "yes-men/idiots." This game just leaves me wishing I hadn't clicked on the "play now" button. It became physically and emotionally painful after the first three minutes of...well...I guess we'll call it play? Now I have to go figure out how to permanently remove this game from my account AND my memory. Unfortunately, time cannot gouge out the mind's eye.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975626528', 'num_games_owned': 597, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 5745, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3043, 'last_played': 1599720685}
review: Quite a fun little diversion from some of the other clicker-type games on Steam.  With tongue firmly planted in cheek, the developers have created a game that takes a satirical look at the porn industry, and incorporates a ton of fun.  Although I haven't been playing long, it doesn't (yet?) feel the least bit grindy, and successes that improve stats, give diamonds, money, clothing, or experience flow frequently just through standard play.  The main drawback that I have currently is that a constant internet connection is required, so those with limited or metered bandwidth may have issues.  All in all, a great FTP experience if you have time to "waste".

author: {'steamid': '76561198163139190', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1472358770}
review: This game isn't meant to be serious.  If you like free to play games that are just meant as a joke then this is for you.  In my opinion this type of game doesn't fit on steam.. It's more of an andriod/IOS game.  But let me explain something to the simple minded folk out there.  This is a free to play game, but not free to develope game.  Free to play games cost anywhere from thousands to millions to create.  They need to get their money back somehow.  You just playing it doesn't help them earn money.  They could put ads on there, but most people hate ads, so they went the micro transaction route. It allows the cheap bastards to play a game for free and the rest of us to pay if we feel like it and speed up the game progress.  If you don't like micro transaction games, well, you're out of luck, even triple A games that cost $60 are starting to do it.  Shame on those slimy dicks.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088834253', 'num_games_owned': 4414, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1472336455}
review:
If you like the (mission success = stamina + time or pay currency) point and click games that are prolific on the mobile platform, and want to add a skin-deep layer of theme flavored to becoming a male or female porn star, then you may like this game. 

Some of the quests and art are funny, the elements of online with other players are fun without feeling too forced if that's not your thing, and just enough attention has been paid to the theme to sorta feel like you're playing a game about porn stars. Maybe. 

I played it to see if you can be male or female and then choose to be in straight or gay adult movies, so I would know whether or not I can recommend it for "Gay Interest" lists. And, in a way, you can. You choose the co-star in your movies, and they can be the same sex. I guess that counts. 

I recommend this game ONLY if the above is of any interest to you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198156047825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 918, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 558, 'last_played': 1472381466}
review:
Rigged asf,P2W (reset shop,diamond items) limited amount of missions/duels per day unless pay with diamonds earned with quests or purchased with real money (P2W or Pay to Advance whatever you wanna call that)

as for the rigged part you never ever get enemies on the duels tab with inferior stats to yours,lets say you have more strenght charisma nor finesse,your enemy will ALWAYS have one stat superior to yours,whats the point of progression if you can't beat anyone? it would be more fair if as you advance you get paired with stronger oponents and not at early game,so i will drop this,if you know about clash of titans or zombies ate my pizza avoid this game at any cost,is just a crash grab for the addicted in browser games and nothing else.

EDIT: Remember when i said above that enemies will always have atleast one stat better than yours? yes this is still the case but the worse is there is  ALOT of rng on top of that, even if you have lets say 30+ on 3 stats on compared to your enemy,so don't think that with overall better stats you win a dual because thats not the case,my advice is complete the tutorial,burn all the free diamonds you get,do some films and then when you burn all your free stuff unistall the game,the game is ok until the "free" aspect of it ends ofc :).

EDIT2: Below i will save you the trouble and tell how the game works

You have 4 stats,for each level up you get two (2) points to spend on which stat you want,to level up you need exp which is acquired doing missions which are time based,to skip the waiting part you can pay with diamonds acquired via achievements or purchased with real money,but don't be fooled the amount gained via achievements is not enough to skip these missions timers as they will be burned very VERY fast,to play missions you need energy ranging from 4 energy to 16 (how far I want,so probably more at late game) you have an total of 100 energy per day,which is reseted on server reset,after you reach a set amount of energy (lets say 50) you can choose to refill it with either credits or diamonds (who would have guessed right?) but keep in mind thats only possible 4 times per day with credits,otherwise only diamonds,now for filming,which is were your epic items will come from (common,rare,epic items) after you reach lvl 8 you get to make films (3 per day),each film requires a set of missions to be done,and like the energy system here you find a similar system but WORSE,you only have 30 points and you need to complete X amount of missions(tasks) to reach 100% of that film,each mission ranging from 4 to 9 points each (remember you only have 30) after you can't complete more missions due to low amount of points you must recharge it with diamonds or guess wait (duhh?? no pay to advance at all,right? right?) and to refill 15 of these points 5 diamonds are nedeed,after you complete a film you get rewarded with the listed items accordinaly to your rating (1,2 or 3 stars),IF you want to do another film you must wait ONE FUCKING HOUR or pay 19 FUCKING diamonds to make another one...

Pros:
Stat Progression (for those who like it,example: dodge/tank/full hp builds)

Cons:
Diamonds
Wait X amount of minutes/Hours
Diamonds
Wait X amount of minutes/Hours
Diamonds
Wait X amount of minutes/Hours
Diamonds

after further research I concluded that,this game,is the exact same thing as any other Browser P2W game,shame really,because if you were to remove the energy bar and the waiting time between missions,tasks,films this game would be actually enjoyable,but eh,money speaks louder when we put the word developer in play right?

author: {'steamid': '76561198010134705', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 226, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1472171045}
review:
Well...  We have 2 energy systems, a timer based misison system that encourages you to buy the premium in game currency.  BTW theres a game currency and a premium currency.  Basically all the standard stuff to pester you to make "in game purchases."  Sadly, the combat is boring, the dress up part is somewhat limited and you aren't allowed to go on a "shoot" until level 10.  Which, I admit, I do not have the patience for.  

Short version:  *Yawn*

Sorry guys.  I would really like to see more adult oriented games out there.  And this one is, at least, not another QIX ripoff.  But... it's boring.  If you want to bore me into micro-transactions, you have to get me hooked into the game first.

review:
Get out Facebook, we dont need this here.

If your looking for porn, nothing to see here folks. Just a pay to play facebook game.
You could instead play Sakura anything and have a much better experience and not pay $100 on gems.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
[list]
[*]nothing
[/list]

[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list]
[*]Everything
[*]Combat and duels are terrible, sit and watch two sprites lunge slowly at each other.
[*]Too many damn things you need to waste money on
[*]Pay to play... or you have to wait up to 12+ minutes on an action
[*]No music... just the empty void calling your soul into the meaningless abyss as it awaits your death.
[*]Terrible graphics
[/list]
